website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a solid design that is pretty but not busy, the strength and beauty of this stoneware vase won't disappoint.
pros: We love this vase's neutral colors that resemble natural stone, and a combination of glazed and unglazed finish
Durable craftsmanship, and can hold large bouquets
cons: Some consumers may prefer a more colorful design, but the upside of the earth-tone style is that it doesn't clash with bold-colored blooms

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: We used for decor in our kitchen and it is so pretty. It goes perfect with our colors :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, pretty and good size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a side table and holds some fake foliage that isn't flashy so the muted tones of the vase is ideal. Will find a place for it for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute little decoration
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice piece yes they do have the measurements but for some reason it looks bigger in the picture
customer_reviews.author: olga betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Great quality item
customer_reviews.text: Very cute vase! Goes well with farmhouse/french style decor. LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren @ Salesforce

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase !
customer_reviews.text: This vase was a perfect fit in our home. Thanks !
customer_reviews.author: JimCosta

customer_reviews.title: color is not same as computer rendition..it's actually more 'white/gray'
customer_reviews.text: the actual vase color is more white/gray in the upper portion...the computer rendition indicates the vase is somewhat more to the beige tone. The product description, however ,DOES indicate the vase is 'milky white glazing on the upper portion'....
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking piece for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This vase is just what I was looking for to put on a cabinet with a lamp. Looks nice with a small plant in it. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: smkincolo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Vase is just as described. Looks great in our kitchen! It has a nice texture and rustic yet modern feel.
customer_reviews.author: chillingout

customer_reviews.title: You will love this well made vase
customer_reviews.text: The Stone & Beam company is providing great decorator pieces. This is the second one I have gotten and I love them both. They look similar, but totally different. This one has a tan base and some splattering of the same color atop a white base. More like a beige white. It isn't white white. so it is muted in color. But, it also is striking in its simplicity. I will be redecorating all over my house and this will be prominently displayed. I will keep it clean and not put anything in it.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cute short vase
customer_reviews.text: A rustic, squat vase good for dessert decor or (my favorite) tree branches. I filled it with sand to keep it from tipping over, and used a few rocks to keep the branches in place. The vase is easy to move about. Filled with sand it's heavy :) At first I thought the marks in the glaze were random to make it look handmade but they are actually leaves. So it's pretty cute.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: NOT large - very small
customer_reviews.text: I was incredibly disappointed by this vase. First the brief description available at this time (no web page was yet available nor description) indicated it was LARGE. I collect LARGE vases - many floor sized between 3 and 4 ft. This isn't large even for a table top. In fact, it's downright small. The neutral colors are attractive but again, unlike the description, this isn't stone, this isn't anything other than a clay type composite. Overall it's a decorative enough item but the given price would make it seem far larger and more appealing than it really is. Overall disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Deserves Center Stage
customer_reviews.text: Stone & Beam Modern Stoneware Vase, 9.25" H, Cream and Clay is a lovely 100% stoneware vase. So lovely, in fact, it’s attractive enough to stand on its own without greenery or flowers. In addition, it’s very neutral in design and tone and, thus, is easy to coordinate with the style of almost any room in the house. I keep ours on the front landing because it deserves center stage. The vase also makes an ideal housewarming or bridal shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ohstacy

customer_reviews.title: Art pottery of a sort, and I like it
customer_reviews.text: I am a lover of art pottery, so this appealed to me, even with the minimal.data supplied. Upon arrival, I find it is about a quart in size with no cover and watertight, even if the glaze is a bit spotty. It is molded, not hand.thrown. There are three buttons on the bottom so it will not scar furniture. Since it is art, the glaze pattern will be a bit different from the picture, but you get the idea. Mine has less brown. I personally like it, and will award five stars, and think the price is fine, now, but would not invest more.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Could serve many uses
customer_reviews.text: As it happens, the appearance of this jar/vase on my Vine queue seems to have been almost an answer to prayer! I was specifically looking for a small (but not too small) vessel which could simulate a rustic water jug. I had actually searched the Internet to find something of this type, and nothing seemed "quite right". This item is well made, understated, but very appealing both in shape and surface. It could easily serve many uses, both decorative and utilitarian.
customer_reviews.author: Trudie Barreras

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality But The Design Is Too Plain For My Taste
customer_reviews.text: I did not find this Vase to be attractive in any way. The design is very plain and the non-uniform "earth tone" at the base is not aesthetically pleasing. It looks more like an unfinished piece than a true modern classic. I understand that art and design are a matter of personal taste but I really expected this to look better in person than the photos but this did not deliver. The price is very high for the simple and plain design.
customer_reviews.author: FirePepper Red

customer_reviews.title: Simple but attractive and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is another delightful vase from Stone and Beam. It is a sturdy, well made vase with a simple but attractive two tone design. The base of the vase is wider than the mouth, which adds to stability. The mouth itself is wider than most vases and will hold more flowers or whatever. The vase comes very well packaged and protected and arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: informednow

customer_reviews.title: Pretty vase, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is a quality vase. The bottom feels more textured, like a terracotta, while the top is ceramic coated. It is very pretty and great for flowers. I received this as part of the Amazon Influencer program although I didn't have to give a review.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel - Craving Some Creativity

customer_reviews.title: This vase is beautiful and fits well with just about any décor
customer_reviews.text: This vase is beautiful and fits well with just about any décor. The neutral colors work great in my beige, mahogany and dark red color scheme. I've put the vase on a small round table with the light through the window giving it a sort of glow.
customer_reviews.author: Perfect Moment

product_meta.title: Amazon Brand – Stone & Beam Modern Farmhouse Milk Jug Stoneware Home Decor Flower Vase - 6.25 x 5.75 Inches, Cream and Clay
product_meta.description: Size:ShortAn Amazon Brand - At first glance it looks like an antique milk jug, but it's actually a stoneware piece sized to hold a small houseplant or freshly cut flowers. The earth-tone clay of the base also shows through the milky white glazing on the upper portion.
feature_bullets: At first glance it looks like an antique milk jug, but it's actually a stoneware piece sized to hold a small houseplant or freshly cut flowers. The earth-tone clay of the base also shows through the milky white glazing on the upper portion.
Can serve as a vase for fresh cut flowers or as a small planter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars35 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
